text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubjectGivenSearchParameter

Parameter subject.given:string

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceSubjectGivenSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.given={givenName}
